ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you wish to pay him back for being a jerk without causing him to loose experience, have hotkeyed something like: /say Wow!  You really DO have great
ygData.messageBody:
Lyrnia suggested:
> Few tips:
>
> 1) Do not group with him
> 2) Charm him and make him attack his pet (he can't cast
> spells at all, pet
> may even kill him before charm wears off)
> 3) Rinse and repeat
>

If you wish to pay him back for being a jerk without causing him to loose
experience, have hotkeyed something like:

/say "Wow! You really DO have great pets!"
/em cringes as he watches the poor little mage get torn to shreads
/say "Did that hurt? Because it looked like it hurt."

and for laughs

/pet who leader

But do let him suicide his pet before it kills him.

Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
